description: This recipe is by Nancy Harmon Jenkins and takes 20 minutes, plus overnight refrigeration. Tell us what you think of it at The New York Times - Dining - Food.
title: Salmon Mousse Recipe
text: Cherry tomatoes are a good choice for this dish, or small salad tomatoes, but ripeness is all - in terms of both presentation and taste. In larger tomatoes, the mousse makes a nice first course at a dinner party, garnished with sorrel sauce (see recipe).
